meanings.sent1: The magician's trick stupefied the audience.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected news stupefied everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: The sudden appearance of a clown at the party stupefied the guests.
meanings.sent4: The speed of the car on the racetrack stupefied the spectators.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was so stupefying that it left everyone speechless.

meanings.definition: Causing someone to be unable to think clearly
meanings.sent1: The stupefying potion made the character in the story confused.
meanings.sent2: The stupefying heat of the desert made it hard to focus.
meanings.sent3: The stupefying riddle left the detective scratching his head.
meanings.sent4: The stupefying effect of the medicine made her feel drowsy.
meanings.sent5: The stupefying complexity of the math problem left the students bewildered.

meanings.sent1: The view from the mountaintop was stupefying.
meanings.sent2: The performance of the acrobat was truly stupefying.
meanings.sent3: The stupefying beauty of the sunset took their breath away.
meanings.sent4: The artist's talent was stupefying to all who saw his work.
meanings.sent5: The orchestra's music was so stupefying that it brought tears to the eyes of the audience.
